SpellModifyFeature.Name: Draconic Spell
SpellModifyFeature.Text: When you cast a spell that deals damage you can spend 1 sorcery point to change the damage type dealt by the spell to the type indicated by your draconic ancestry.
SpellModifyFeature.Prerequisite: You must have the Draconic Bloodline sorcerous origin to take this option.
SpellModifyFeature.Spells: Fire or Cold or Lightning or Thunder or Poison or Necrotic or Radiant or Acid or Force
